CustomField.formula: IF( OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Initial Needs Assessment"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Initial Estimate"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Refinement of Needs Assessment"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Quote"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiate"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Submittal"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Re-Quote")), 1, 0)
CustomField.label: Oppty Open
